name: Merge Fever
description:
Merge Fever gamifies Git Flow, you play as a HEAD ready to add commits to a git project, each time you commit you add lines to your project, that only have full meaning once you make a release commit on the master branch so people can use the new version of your project.

Don't miss any release commit, your project might be considered discontinued if you miss 3 releases.

Controls

Use the UP and DOWN arrow keys to git checkout to other branches.
